name: Game Of Life
title: A Processing implementation of Game of Life
author: Joan Soler-Adillon
description: Press SPACE BAR to pause and change the cell's values with the mouse. On pause, click to activate/deactivate cells. Press 'R' to randomly reset the cells' grid. Press 'C' to clear the cells' grid. The original Game of Life was created by John Conway in 1970.
